titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Community Relations
Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Community Relations
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday April 18, 2019 at 07:23

did.unittitle: Secretary's office, Yale University, records concerning community relations

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, subject files, reports, financial records, and related materials documenting Yale University's relations with the New Haven community, primarily from the late 1960s through 1988.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-D (YRG 4-D), Records documenting community relations of Yale University.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Office of the Secretary, 1977-1990.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Secretary's Office, Yale University, Records Concerning Community Relations (RU 53). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, subject files, reports, financial records, and related materials documenting Yale University's relations with the New Haven community, primarily from the late 1960s through 1988.

controlaccess.subject: Community and college
Universities and colleges -- Administration
University towns
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
